content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. So, let's get down to business. How much are you willing to pay for this beautiful, centrally located property?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the unfurnished state and size of the apartment, I think a reasonable price would be around 650 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than I was expecting. I'm looking for a price closer to 850 Euros per month. What do you think about that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the unfurnished state and size of the apartment, 850 Euros per month seems a bit high. I'm willing to pay 700 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm not sure if you're aware, but the location and the quality of this apartment are quite exceptional. 700 Euros per month is still below my asking price. Let's meet in the middle and say 775 Euros per month. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but given the unfurnished state and size of the apartment, 775 Euros per month is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay 725 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I must insist on 775 Euros per month. This is a fair price considering the amenities and the prime location of the apartment. Can we agree on this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 750 Euros per month is still not in line with my expectations. However, since we're getting closer, I'll make you a special offer. If you're willing to pay 775 Euros per month, I'll include one month of free rent as an incentive. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 775 Euros per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease, and we'll proceed with the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
